tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE AuditLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    user_id INT,
    note TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE PolicyMakers (
    policymaker_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50),
    organization VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Audits (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policymaker_id INT REFERENCES PolicyMakers(policymaker_id),
    audit_date DATE,
    audit_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE FinancialData (
    financial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    audit_id INT REFERENCES Audits(audit_id),
    financial_year INT,
    financial_data TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE AuditRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    audit_id INT REFERENCES Audits(audit_id),
    record_type VARCHAR(50),
    record_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE audit_details (
	audit_id INT,
	auditor_id INT,
	audit_rating VARCHAR(10),
	audit_comments TEXT,
	FOREIGN KEY (audit_id) REFERENCES financial_data(audit_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (auditor_id) REFERENCES auditor(auditor_id)
);
